Usage example

Controller code:


            this.checkbox = false;

In template:


            <ul>
                <li>
                    <lp-custom-checkbox ng-model="mainCtrl.checkbox" name="lp-checkbox">
                        Check me
                    </lp-custom-checkbox>
                </li>
                <li>
                    <lp-custom-checkbox ng-disabled="true" name="lp-checkbox">
                        Disabled
                    </lp-custom-checkbox>
                </li>
                <li>
                    Is it checked? {{ mainCtrl.checkbox }}
                </li>
            </ul>

Demo:

  • Check me
  • Disabled
  • Is it checked? {{ mainCtrl.checkbox }}
